word:
Due Consideration 

     It is not the will of God that any of His servants should move hastily and take shortsighted views. He 
                                                                           211
would have them wait patiently, and manifest due consideration. Every movement should be made with judicious thoughtfulness, and after much prayer. Then our brethren will have a more even, tranquil experience, and will be able to be a greater benefit to the people; for the glory of the Lord will be their rearward.
